participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Resilient and strong-willed, she has a nurturing side but can be assertive when necessary.
participant_1.background: i was forced to marry when i was a teenager. my aunt helped me escape when i was in my early twenties. i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and warm-hearted, she enjoys connecting with others and sharing her hobbies.
participant_2.background: i've two dogs. i love to bake cookies. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.
